quests.desc: You are now playing a life changing session of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, go south. After that, take the non-euclidean latchkey from the bench within the shower. And then, make absolutely sure that the non-euclidean gate is unlocked. After you have unlocked the non-euclidean gate, make it so that the non-euclidean gate is open. After that, make an attempt to venture east. And then, retrieve the cake scented passkey from the floor of the study. If you can get your hands on the cake scented passkey, unlock the cake scented gate within the study. And then, assure that the cake scented gate is ajar. And then, try to go to the east. With that over with, take a trip south. After that, head east. Then, travel east. Following that, go north. Following that, retrieve the laptop from the floor of the workshop. Got that? Good!
commands: unlock non-euclidean gate with non-euclidean latchkey
unlock cake scented gate with cake scented passkey
unlock non-euclidean gate with non-euclidean latchkey
unlock cake scented gate with cake scented passkey

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a sauna.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. An ordinary one.

 You see a refrigerator.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. A normal kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] toolbox in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box, which looks ordinary, close by.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You're now in the office. You begin looking for stuff.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookhouse.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You are in a cookery. A typical kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a workshop.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a locker.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a cubicle.

 Look over there! a case.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The case contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've entered a vault. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can see a display. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The display contains [a list of things in the c_5], so there's that.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The display is empty![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into an attic. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] crate.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The crate is empty![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a table. [if there is something on the s_0]On the table you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty.[end if] You can make out a shelf. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]The shelf appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a pantry.



 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just come into a steam room.



There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
A crooked signboard tells you that you are now in the bedroom. The room is well lit.

 You see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see a mantelpiece. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The mantelpiece is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. What's the point of an empty mantelpiece?[end if] You make out a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the bookshelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bookshelf.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cake scented gate leading west. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've entered a study. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cake scented gate leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] non-euclidean gate leading west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A standard one.

 You can make out a bench. The bench is usual.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] non-euclidean gate leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've entered a basement. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can make out a cabinet. Huh, weird.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A typical kind of place.

 You can make out a desk. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a desk? The desk is typical.[if there is something on the s_5] On the desk you see [a list of things on the s_5]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the desk, like an empty desk, has nothing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You arrive in a dish-pit. A typical one.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a freezer.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_9], so there's that.[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a plate. [if there is something on the s_6]On the plate you make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if] You can see a platter. The platter is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the platter you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the platter.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Here we are in the spare room.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a stand. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_8]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You make out a counter. Now why would someone leave that there? [if there is something on the s_9]You see [a list of things on the s_9] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: silent office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A silent kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an unblocked exit to the north.

walkthrough: unlock non-euclidean gate with non-euclidean latchkey
unlock cake scented gate with cake scented passkey

objective: You are now playing a fast paced session of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to go south. That done, retrieve the non-euclidean latchkey from the bench in the shower. After that, unlock the non-euclidean gate inside the shower. And then, make it so that the non-euclidean gate inside the shower is open. Then, make an attempt to venture east. And then, pick up the cake scented passkey from the floor of the study. If you can get your hands on the cake scented passkey, check that the cake scented gate in the study is unlocked with the cake scented passkey. And then, open the cake scented gate in the study. After that, go to the east. With that accomplished, make an effort to head south. With that done, head east. And then, take a trip east. After that, try to head north. And then, recover the laptop from the floor of the workshop. And if you do that, you're the winner!
